page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Stories of local interest from the Sandwell 'Express and Star' newspaper: NEW CADBURY'S DEPOT A massive new distribution depot for Cadbury's chocolates was opened in Oldbury at the beginning of June. It is to carry out distribution work from Scotland to Cornwall. Most of the new staff live locally. Cadbury's were tempted to Oldbury by an urban aid grant. CYCLING FOR CHARITY Three workers from the Albright and Wilson works have cycled almost 1000 miles for charity. They cycled the length of the country to raise money for hospital equipment. LOCAL MUSICAL PRODUCTION Oldbury Rep. are staging the musical 'Annie' this month. It is their most ambitious project ever. Local children are playing the parts of orphans.
